comments.text: I REALLY hope this ends up working well. There are so many “low-end” games in my library that I’m sure would run perfectly on my Mac but just aren’t officially compatible.
comments.author: @EdibleGymSock

comments.text: Also isn’t balders gate 3 able to run natively on Apple silicon via steam?
comments.author: @oofers1151

comments.text: I think Crossover does this already
comments.author: @chrismack.

comments.text: Well, those 3 games do run great on Mac with crossover, and BG3 runs natively. Which is why Mac users are not impressed right now, but hopefully they show more stuff. It could be really cool.
comments.author: @nicolealmeida

comments.text: the man bun lookin good bro
